response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe holds significant value for someone like yourself. This product, which has been meticulously crafted and designed to meet the highest standards, is not just an item but a testament to excellence and innovation. I am confident it will serve as a valuable asset in your endeavors.

I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a generous discount compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for someone looking to make a strategic investment or acquire a high-quality item.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information to help you understand its full potential and how it could benefit you.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
